text: Speed of Sound is the ninth studio album by Canadian heavy metal band Anvil, released in 1999. ==Track listing== == Personnel == Anvil * Steve "Lips" Kudlow – vocals, lead guitar * Ivan Hurd – lead guitar * Glenn Gyorffy – bass * Robb Reiner – drums Production * Pierre Rémillard – engineer, mixing * Alexander Krull – mastering * Gijsbert van Frankenhuyzen – executive producer ==References== Category:1999 albums Category:Anvil (band) albums Category:Massacre Records albums
title: Speed of Sound (Anvil album)
